name: create-component-React
description: Create your React Js components (Currently) in a fast way, with multiple variety in less than 5 seconds.

reactCreateComponent.settings.importReac.markdownDescription:
Controls if snippets should add `import React from 'react';` at the top of components.
Use if you have React +17 and use jsx transform.

reactCreateComponent.settings.SelectExte.markdownDescription:
Controls the style of the component.
Use if you want to use css, sass, or scss.

reactCreateComponent.settings.CreateBarr.markdownDescription: Controls the creation of the barrel file or index file inside the folder.

reactCreateComponent.settings.SelectLang.markdownDescription:
Controls the language of the component.
Use if you want to use javascript or typescript.

reactCreateComponent.settings.SelectType.markdownDescription:
Controls the type of the component.
Use if you want to use style traditional, style module, style component, or not style.

reactCreateComponent.settings.CreateFold.markdownDescription: Controls the creation of the folder styles.
